Body:
Since Core IoT doesn't support persistent connections, is there a way to know form the client side if the subscription is still alive? I have a scenario with very unstable Internet connection and it's a pain to keep check internet every time.

The way I'm doing, with some failures, is to subscribe every time a new connection is established (on_connect). This works most of the times, but it's not 100% working. Any idea or suggestion? If I subscribe multiple times (let's say, every 5m send a subscribe), does that create problems? I know it's not fancy, but at least I got connectivity assurance back.
